short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Ultimate Controller manipulating Video Playback Speeds across OTT platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Video Controller that lets you speed up videos on OTTs like -

- Netflix,
- Amazon Prime Video,
- Hotstar,
more coming soon.

The extension can retain & sync your last used playback speed across all your synced devices with support for chrome extensions. In other words, while binge-watching shows, set the speed once.. the extension does the rest!!
